column1: Local Foods////The decor was the second thing I noticed. (After I ran to the restroom from drinking too much iced coffee for the sake of finals-- by the way
column2: if you go to the restroom look at the trash can because that cool 4 leaf clover design is pretty bomb. Nice trashcan
column3: Local Foods.) It's a clash of lots of different decor but it just somehow works. Very clean and very interesting. The most interesting
column5: is the choice to but the dishes and bowls on a hanging slab of wood. It's kind of cool
